title: Michael Gill Sr's Evidence to Attorney Andrew Lelling (United States Attorney's Office for the District of Massachusetts)

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Michael Gill Sr's Evidence to Attorney Andrew Lelling (United States Attorney's Office for the District of Massachusetts)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern:

Re: EOUSA-2024-003101

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Michael Gill Sr of 69 Conleys Grove Road, Derry, New Hampshire sent three folders of evidence to US Attorney Andrew Lelling dated June 17 and postmarked July 18 2018. Confirmation of receipt by Andrew Lelling was sent on July 30, 2018.

Firstly I request that the US Attorney's Office confirm that everything listed on that receipt is still in their possession and necessary action is being taken to see that this matter is looked into with the request made by Patrick Mockridge case # EOUSA-2024-003101:
1) Morris Mahoney and Liberty Mutual et cetera
2) IRS Boston office et cetera
3) Drug cartel activity et cetera

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Stacy Weller

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Stacy Weller
